About the Company: Can Fin Homes Ltd. is a Housing Finance Company. The company offers finance for construction of a house, loan for the purchase of a flat or house, finance for the acquisition of a plot and construction of a house on the same. Under the composite housing loan scheme; it offers loan for the extension of existing house and loan towards the repairs, renovation and upgradation of a house or flat. Can Fin also provides offers fixed deposit, cumulative deposit, fixed deposit scheme for senior citizens, cumulative deposit scheme for senior citizens, Canfin Trust Fixed Deposit scheme and Canfin Trust Cumulative Deposit scheme.
